name: Cyber Thonk
description:
When the roly robots came, Gangster Greg was very sad. So Greg decided to grab his baseball bat and grappling hook and make the robots very sad instead. Welcome to Cyber Thonk.

This game was made in ten days for Carnegie Mellon's National High School Game Academy 2021. Fight robots with your baseball bat and grappling hook to move through rooms and beat the final boss.

Programming - Giancarlo Massimo, Isaac Ahmed
Art - Claire Yang, Nitin Sathya
Sound Design - Katherine Huang

Controls:
 - WASD to move
 - Click to swing your bat
 - Space to activate your grappling hook while an enemy is rolling
 - E to interact with health machines
 - Escape to pause 

*NOTE: the Mac build doesn't work great
